name: Generic Interview
children.name: Introductions
description:
General introductions and getting to know the candidate.
questions: Tell me a little about yourself.
Whats the most interesting thing you've learned recently?
Whats your favorite new experimental technology?
lookoutFor: Are they passionate about something they've worked on in the past?
Do you they keep abreast on new developments in the field? Are they excited / learning any new cutting-edge stuff?
followups: Tell me about the project you're most proud of.

children.name: Implement Each
children.description:
Implement the each function that accepts an array as input and loops over it
                        executing a callback on each item in the array.
questions: Why don't you write some tests with expected inputs and outputs
Cool, now lets implement the function!
lookoutFor: Understanding of inputs and outputs and how to write simple tests
Understanding of a callback and functions as first class citizens
followups: Do you have any questions you want to ask me about callbacks or functional programming?
